ProductInfo.Features:
With a retractable camera built-into the TV it's easy to stay connected with friends and family through Skype. Plus LG Smart TV recognizes your voice and gestures. So you have a seeing and hearing TV that will enhance your experience ad redefine the meaning of Smart
LG's Cinema 3D TV can bring all this right into your home. Enjoy easy to use & share 3D glasses, outstanding picture quality and amazing 3D effects - that's what you get with an LG Cinema 3D experience
ProductInfo.Name: LG 60LA8600 60" 1080p Smart TV, 240Hz, Dual Core, 3D Cam, MR w/voice, Cinema Screen Design, Magic Remote - Bundle - with Sanus Systems ELM202 6-Outlet Surge Protector, Xtreme Cables HDMI 1.4 Audio/Video 6' Cable for 3D HDTV, & Xtreme Cables 200ml HDTV Deluxe Cleaning Kit
